title: suggestions?
content: I was just wondering if anyone could let me know the easiest way to track down a certain font. For example, you find a font you love and you want to track it down. What is your next step? Forgive me if this is a dumb question, Any advice would be appreciated. thank you.
author: trillster

comments.content:
What exactly do you mean? Do do you need to find out what font it is?

If that is the case, give the [Type ID Board](http://web.archive.org/web/20060329212500/http:/typophile.com/forum/29) a go. All you need to do is to post an image sample of the font you want identified.

Or post it on what [whatthefont](http://web.archive.org/web/20060329212500/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/)

but Typophile is always better - people vs machines.
